page.title: 17At School
page.content: When I arrive, at Flexlands School I go up to my {classroom}where I sit at a desk. A bell rings at 9.00am for prayers. We sit on benches while the headmistress talks about things. Then we have{lessons}till 10.30. All the{subjects}we have are:{Bible, {English, Poetry, Geography, History, {Maths, Music, Games, General {Knowledge, Art, Verbal Reasoning and {Science.}I write with a pen which contains a cartridge of ink. At 10.30 we have break until 11.00. Then we have lessons.{Lunch}is 1.00.We have something different everyday. We have a first course, pudding and a glass of water to drink. Then we have another break till 2.00. More lessons then till 4.00 when our parents collect us in{cars.}When we get home we have{homework}to do.
